### Contract Invitation for Tractor Acquisition 

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) hereby invites bidders to submit proposals for the acquisition of a tractor for operational purposes, to be used by Parks Canada Agency (PC) for various tasks such as transporting materials to hard-to-reach locations, lawn mowing, and snow removal.

**Contract Details**
--------------------------------

* **Notice Number:** WS4431965849
* **Publication Date:** March 6, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 11, 2024 at 2:00 p.m. EDT ( Please note that bids submitted after 2:00 p.m. EDT will be considered non-responsive)
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity:** Parks Canada Agency (PC)

**Tender Description**
------------------------

The acquired tractor will be expected to navigate restricted areas such as hiking trails and camping loops, and transport gravel, sand, and stone to hard-to-reach locations inaccessible by motorized vehicles. Additionally, it will be used for lawn mowing and snow removal with a rear-mounted blower.

It is planned that if the indigenous business tender (Stream 1) is not conclusive, the tender for general business (Stream 2) will be considered.

**Key Features and Requirements**
--------------------------------

* The proposed tractor must navigate restricted areas and transport materials to hard-to-reach locations.
* The tractor must be also equipped with a rear-mounted blower for lawn mowing and snow removal.
* The selected tractor will be used in severe weather conditions.

**Bidder Information**
----------------------

* **Bid Inquiry:** For more information about the tender, please visit the Ariba Discovery platform at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19005834?extsite=MTkwMDU4MzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* **Contact Person:** Chantal DesGroseilliers, PSPC/SPPC

### Assumptions
------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services reserves the right to reject any or all bids at any time without assigning any reason. Any exceptions to the standard terms and conditions of the tender document will be addressed in the offer.

**Closing Date and Submissions**
--------------------------------#

Bidders must submit their proposals electronically to the above Ariba platform by the closing date and time. Late proposals will not be accepted.
